code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FreelancerDashboard=()=>{const[projects,setProjects]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const token=localStorage.getItem("token");axios.get(`${process.env.REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL}/projects`,{headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${token}`}}).then(res=>setProjects(res.data)).catch(err=>console.error("‚ùå Error fetching available projects:",err.message));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-3xl font-bold text-gray-800 mb-4",children:"Welcome, Freelancer \uD83D\uDC4B"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-600 mb-6",children:"Start finding work, updating your profile, or checking applications here."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex gap-4 mb-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/projects",className:"bg-green-600 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded hover:bg-green-700",children:"\uD83D\uDD0D Browse Projects"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/my-applications",className:"bg-gray-100 text-gray-800 px-4 py-2 rounded hover:bg-gray-200",children:"\uD83D\uDCC4 View My Applications"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-semibold text-gray-700 mb-2",children:"Latest Opportunities"}),projects.length>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"space-y-4",children:projects.slice(0,3).map(project=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"p-4 bg-white rounded shadow border border-gray-100",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"font-bold text-green-700",children:project.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-600",children:project.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"text-sm text-gray-400",children:["Budget: ",project.budget]})]},project._id))}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-500",children:"No projects found. Time to refresh or try again later!"})]})]});};export default FreelancerDashboard;
